articles.title: Spanish FA have threatened to leave UEFA if Luis Rubiales is removed — report - Managing Madrid
articles.description: The Royal Spanish Football Federation (RFEF) is in danger of being suspended by UEFA, the European football governing body, after its secretary general Andreu Camps sent a letter accusing the...
